pkgmetadata.longdescription: Search Best ARIMA, GARCH, and MS-GARCH Model // Get the most appropriate autoregressive integrated moving average, generalized auto-regressive conditional heteroscedasticity and Markov switching GARCH model. For method details see Haas M, Mittnik S, Paolella MS (2004). doi:10.1093/jjfinec/nbh020, Bollerslev T (1986). doi:10.1016/0304-4076(86)90063-1.
